_sText:
This is the best Gun have ever seen for css it is fully automatic, and if it starts to lagyou can brake all the shells at once by rightclicking your mouce that also exsplodes all the rounds in the air which can help if your not good at getting a perfict shot this gun. This gun shoots 5 rounds every second and about 300 rounds a min XD have fun! Feedback would be appreciated. 

In response to the first post I have made the gun 3 different sizes small medium and big so it can be adapted to mare maps thx for the comment.
